meanings.sent1: During the tussle, the two kids wrestled playfully on the grass.
meanings.sent2: The tussle between the two teams for the ball was intense.
meanings.sent3: In the tussle over the last cookie, they both ended up laughing.
meanings.sent4: The tussle for power in the company boardroom was like a chess match.
meanings.sent5: The tussle between the siblings over the TV remote was a daily occurrence.

meanings.definition: To engage in a physical fight or struggle
meanings.sent1: The siblings would often tussle over who got to sit in the front seat of the car.
meanings.sent2: The two dogs playfully tussled over a squeaky toy.
meanings.sent3: The kittens tussled around in a cute little ball of fur.
meanings.sent4: The children tussled for the last piece of cake at the party.
meanings.sent5: The friends tussled good-naturedly during their friendly game of tag.
